item.title: India's Squad For ODI Series Against England: Yashasvi Jaiswal Earns Maiden Call-Up, Siraj Dropped - News18
item.description:
India's ODI Squad Against England Features Yashasvi Jaiswal, Mohammed Siraj Dropped

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 Source: News18

Indian cricket selectors announced the ODI squad for the upcoming series against England, which will consist of three matches starting from February 6, 2025. Yashasvi Jaiswal has earned his first call-up to the ODI team, while Mohammed Siraj has been dropped.

  • Yashasvi Jaiswal makes his debut selection for the India ODI team.
  • Mohammed Siraj is omitted from the squad for this series.
  • Jasprit Bumrah is included for the Champions Trophy despite injury concerns.
  • Rohit Sharma will captain the team, with Shubman Gill as vice-captain.
  • Key players like Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, and KL Rahul retain their places in the squad.
“Yashasvi Jaiswal has deservingly earned his maiden India ODI call-up for the home series.”

The ODI series will be crucial for India's preparations ahead of the Champions Trophy scheduled later this year.

item.title: Aussies make blistering start on opening day of U19WC 2025 - ICC Cricket
item.description:
Aussies Dominate Opening Day at U19 Women's World Cup 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: ICC Cricket

Australia showcased their dominance in the opening matches of the tournament, quickly defeating Scotland while rain disrupted other matches.

Key Points:

  • Australia bowled out Scotland for 48 runs and chased down the target in just 6.4 overs.
  • Kate Pelle led by scoring 29 runs off 18 balls.
  • The match between Samoa and Nigeria was abandoned due to rain without any play.
  • England scored 144 runs against Ireland, but their match ended in a draw due to rain.
“Rain has final say in England and Ireland's showdown.”

This opening day set a thrilling tone for the U19 Women's World Cup, though weather chaos disrupts some encounters.

item.title: Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final: KAR beat VID by 36 runs in Vadodara - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final

Date: Saturday, January 2025
Source: Indian Express

Karnataka win their fifth Vijay Hazare Trophy as they beat Vidarbha by 36 runs in an exciting final in Vadodara.

  • Karnataka set a target of 349 runs with Ravichandran Smaran scoring a crucial 101.
  • Dhruv Shorey led Vidarbha's chase with a commendable 110 runs but lacked support.
  • Karnataka's bowlers Vasuki Koushik, Prasidh Krishna, and Abhilash Shetty each took three wickets at important moments.
  • Other key contributions came from Krishnan Shrijith (78) and Abhinav Manohar (79).
"Sachin Tendulkar praised Karun Nair's outstanding form, urging him to keep going after an extraordinary season averaging 752 runs."

The match showcased Karnataka's dominance in the tournament, further solidifying their status in Indian domestic cricket.

item.title: Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final: VID beat KAR by 36 runs in Vadodara - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final

Date & Source: Saturday, January 17, 2025, Indian Express

Karnataka clinched their fifth Vijay Hazare Trophy title by defeating Vidarbha by 36 runs in the final held at Kotambi Stadium, Vadodara. Karnataka posted a total of 348 runs, setting a challenging target for Vidarbha.

  • Dhruv Shorey scored a commendable 110 runs for Vidarbha, but lacked support from the rest of the team.
  • Karnataka's bowlers made significant impacts with Vasuki Koushik, Prasidh Krishna, and Abhilash Shetty each taking three wickets.
  • Karnataka's middle-order players, including Ravichandran Smaran, Krishnan Shrijith, and Abhinav Manohar, contributed crucial runs in the innings.
Sachin Tendulkar praised Karun Nair's outstanding performance, averaging 752 in the tournament.

In conclusion, Karnataka's strategic play and strong performances led them to a well-deserved victory in the Vijay Hazare Trophy final.

item.title: This star Pakistan cricketer fell in love with Indian woman, divorced his Pakistani wife, his name is..., his wife is... - India.com
item.description:
This star Pakistan cricketer fell in love with Indian woman, divorced his Pakistani wife, his name is..., his wife is...

Publication Date: October 2023
Source: India.com

Despite the bitter relations between India and Pakistan, love finds its way. This article explores the romantic journey of Pakistani cricketer Zaheer Abbas who divorced his first wife to marry Indian beauty Rita Luthra.

  • Zaheer Abbas was known as 'Asian Bradman' and is a former professional cricketer.
  • He fell in love with Rita Luthra while playing county cricket in England.
  • The couple's families had past connections, as their fathers knew each other from before partition.
  • Zaheer was previously married and had three daughters before marrying Rita.
  • Rita converted to Islam and changed her name to Sameena to marry Zaheer.
“Love knows no borders” - Zaheer Abbas

This love story exemplifies how personal connections can traverse political divides and highlight the complexities of intercultural relationships.

item.title: Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final: VID 180/3 (Target 349) vs KAR in Vadodara - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final

Date & Source: January 2025, Indian Express

In the final of the Vijay Hazare Trophy at Kotambi Stadium, Karnataka has set a target of 349 runs for Vidarbha with a score of 348/6. Key players include Ravichandran Smaran, Krishnan Shrijith, and Abhinav Manohar, while Vidarbha's bowlers Darshan Nalkande and Nachiket Bhute took two wickets each.

  • Karnataka scored 348 runs with notable contributions from Smaran (101), Shrijith (78), and Manohar (79).
  • Vidarbha's bowling was led by Nalkande and Bhute, each taking 2 wickets.
  • Karun Nair of Vidarbha has been in exceptional form, scoring consistently in previous matches.
  • Nair has the chance to set a record for most runs by a captain in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
“Nair has tallied 752 runs at an average of 752 this season, the most by a captain in the history of the Vijay Hazare Trophy.”

Karnataka's performance has placed them in a strong position, while Vidarbha looks to chase the target.

item.title: 'Boring tha': Rohit Sharma's offbeat humour at Champions Trophy presser goes viral. Watch - The Times of India
item.description:
'Boring tha': Rohit Sharma's Offbeat Humour at Champions Trophy Presser Goes Viral

Date: NEW DELHI
Source: Times of India

During the squad selection press conference, Indian captain Rohit Sharma lightened the mood with his humorous comment, which quickly gained traction online.

  • Rohit Sharma quipped about the press conference being boring.
  • Ajit Agarkar, the chief selector, smiled in response, adding to the light-hearted atmosphere.
  • The event announced India's squad for the ODI series against England and the Champions Trophy 2025.
  • Key players like Yashasvi Jaiswal and Harshit Rana received their maiden call-ups.
  • Mohammed Shami and Kuldeep Yadav returned from injuries, while Jasprit Bumrah's fitness remains a concern.
“Boring tha PC,” says Rohit Sharma, highlighting his humorous side during the announcement.

This light moment is a reminder of the importance of humor in high-pressure situations, exemplified by Rohit Sharma's wit.

item.title: Five Chelsea players Man Utd could sign in Garnacho deal - GIVEMESPORT
item.description:
Five Chelsea Players Manchester United Could Target in Garnacho Deal

Published on: October 2023 Source: GiveMeSport

Following rumors of a potential transfer involving Alejandro Garnacho to Chelsea, Manchester United is considering several players from Stamford Bridge as possible signings.

  • Carney Chukwuemeka - Aiming to bolster midfield depth.
  • Joao Felix - Previous interest and a potential fit for United's attacking needs.
  • Christopher Nkunku - A valuable target considering his past links with United.
  • Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall - Possible replacement as United transitions from older players.
  • Ben Chilwell - Targeted as a new left-back option for United.
"Whether because of the Napoli or Chelsea links, there is some potential to consider the situation..."

This situation may lead to significant changes in the team structures of both clubs moving forward.

item.title: Sanju Samson 'is having his career destroyed by egos of cricket administrators': Shashi Tharoor - Firstpost
item.description:
Sanju Samson 'is having his career destroyed by egos of cricket administrators': Shashi Tharoor

Publication Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Firstpost

Shashi Tharoor has criticized the Kerala Cricket Association for their role in Sanju Samson's exclusion from India's Champions Trophy 2025 squad, attributing it to the association's internal politics.

  • Samson missed the Vijay Hazare Trophy, affecting his selection for the Indian team.
  • Tharoor claims KCA's ego is destroying Samson's career.
  • Samson's last ODI performance was a century against South Africa.
  • KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant were chosen as wicket-keepers instead of Samson.

The sorry saga of the Kerala Cricket Association and Sanju Samson -- the player wrote to KCA, in advance, regretting his inability to attend a training camp between the SMA and the Vijay Hazare Trophy tournaments, and was promptly dropped from the squad -- has now resulted in…

— Shashi Tharoor (@ShashiTharoor) January 18, 2025

Tharoor expresses concern over Samson's future in cricket due to these administrative decisions.

item.title: Noman, Sajid lead Pakistan's charge on 19-wicket day - Cricbuzz
item.description:
Noman, Sajid lead Pakistan's charge on 19-wicket day

Published on: Sat, Jan 18, 2025, 12:29 PM
Source: Cricbuzz

Noman Ali and Sajid Khan delivered stellar performances, leading Pakistan to a commanding position in the Multan Test against West Indies, finishing Day 2 with a record-breaking 19 wickets taken.

  • Noman Ali took 5 wickets for 39 runs, while Sajid Khan claimed 4 for 65.
  • Pakistan scored 230 runs in their first innings after a lower-order collapse, with Saud Shakeel (84) and Mohammad Rizwan (71) contributing significantly.
  • West Indies were bowled out for just 137, unable to cope with Pakistan's spin attack.
  • Shan Masood provided crucial runs in the second innings, scoring 52 not out amidst challenging conditions.
  • The match set a record for the most wickets taken in a day of Test cricket.
"West Indies crumbled for just 137 in reply as the Pakistan spinners wreaked havoc."

This extraordinary performance underscores Pakistan’s stronghold in the match, leading by 202 runs with three wickets remaining in the second innings.

item.title: Rohit available for next Ranji Trophy round, but Kohli and Rahul out - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Rohit available for next Ranji Trophy round, but Kohli and Rahul out

Publication Date: January 2023 | Source: ESPN Cricinfo

India captain Rohit Sharma has confirmed his participation for the next round of Ranji Trophy matches starting January 23. Despite recent concerns regarding his form, he is eager to prove himself in domestic cricket.

  • Rohit has had a challenging time in his last eight Tests, with a batting average of 10.93 this season.
  • Virat Kohli and KL Rahul are unavailable due to injuries—they reported neck and elbow issues, respectively.
  • The BCCI's new protocol requires all contracted players to participate in domestic matches unless they face fitness problems.
“I will,” Rohit confirmed when asked about playing the upcoming Ranji game.

Although Kohli and Rahul may miss the next Ranji games, both are expected to be considered for the ODI series against England starting February 6.

item.title: Rohit Sharma hints players have reservations about 10-point diktat, to discuss issue with BCCI - The Economic Times
item.description:
Rohit Sharma hints players have reservations about 10-point diktat, to discuss issue with BCCI

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Rohit Sharma has expressed concerns regarding the BCCI's 10-point guidelines aimed at team conduct, particularly about travel restrictions for players' families during long tours.

  • Players have reservations about the old policy allowing families only for 14 days on long tours.
  • Rohit is set to meet with BCCI Secretary Devajit Saikia to discuss these concerns.
  • Ajit Agarkar confirmed an SOP has been drafted, clarifying the BCCI's intentions.
  • Rohit emphasized that the rules are not punitive but meant to refine team protocols.
  • There are ongoing discussions about the relationship and communication between players and management.
“I have to sit down with the secretary to discuss about family (travel guidelines). Everyone (players) is asking me.” - Rohit Sharma

This situation highlights ongoing tensions in team management and the players' desire for more autonomy regarding family travel during matches.

item.title: Vinod Kambli shows tattoo of second wife Andrea, it also has... - India.com
item.description:
Vinod Kambli Shows Tattoo of Second Wife Andrea, It Also Has...

Published on: Date Not Provided | Source: India.com

Former India cricketer Vinod Kambli reveals his tattoo of second wife Andrea Hewitt and also talks about his friendship with Sachin Tendulkar.

  • Vinod Kambli has a tattoo naming his second wife Andrea Hewitt on his left hand.
  • The tattoo also features the name of his beloved son.
  • Kambli shared experiences from his cricketing past, including a memorable debut in Wankhede Stadium.
  • He expressed concern about his financial situation affecting his children’s education.
"Vinod Kambli mentioned that Sachin Tendulkar did not even ask him about his health when he was hospitalized."

This reveal of Kambli's tattoo brings personal insights into his life and struggles, emphasizing the complexities of celebrity relationships and the importance of familial ties.

item.title: Bumrah, Jaiswal and Kuldeep picked in India's Champions Trophy squad - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Bumrah, Jaiswal and Kuldeep Selected for India's Champions Trophy Squad

Publication Date: February 11, 2025

Source: ESPN Cricinfo

The Indian cricket team has finalized its 15-man squad for the upcoming Champions Trophy, with notable inclusions of Jasprit Bumrah and Kuldeep Yadav, who were previously dealing with injuries. Yashasvi Jaiswal also makes his ODI debut with this selection.

  • The squad will be led by Rohit Sharma and vice-captained by Shubman Gill.
  • Kuldeep Yadav has been rehabilitating and is set to return after his hernia surgery.
  • Jasprit Bumrah's inclusion is subject to fitness after a stress-related injury.
  • India plays three ODIs against England before the Champions Trophy, marking their return to the format after a gap.
  • The team is in Group A and will face Bangladesh, Pakistan, and New Zealand in the tournament.
“The final squad for the Champions Trophy must be submitted to the ICC by February 11.”

This selection marks a strategic move for India as they approach the prestigious tournament, aiming for strong performances despite recent injury challenges.

item.title: India Squad Announcement For Champions Trophy Highlights: Mohammed Shami Returns, Big Stars Miss Out - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India Squad Announcement For Champions Trophy Highlights: Mohammed Shami Returns, Big Stars Miss Out

Publication Date: Not provided | Source: NDTV

This article discusses the recent announcement of the Indian cricket squad for the upcoming Champions Trophy, highlighting the return of bowler Mohammed Shami, while noting the absence of several key players.

  • Mohammed Shami makes a comeback to the Indian squad.
  • Notable players such as Jasprit Bumrah and Virat Kohli are missing from the lineup.
  • The selection process has sparked discussions among fans and analysts regarding team strategy.
“The selection is aimed at balancing experienced players with fresh talent.” - Team Management

The squad announcement has generated significant interest, reflecting ongoing changes in team dynamics as India prepares for the Champions Trophy.

item.title: 6,6,6,6,6,6,6,6, Good news for Delhi Capitals ahead of IPL 2025, THIS star player smashed 95 of just...., Kept his team alive in the race of .. - India.com
item.description:
Good news for Delhi Capitals ahead of IPL 2025 as a star player smashed 95*

Publication Date: not specified | Source: india.com

Jake Fraser-McGurk led the Melbourne Renegades to a thrilling three-wicket win over Brisbane Heat in the Big Bash League (BBL), smashing 95 runs off 46 balls, keeping his team alive in the race for the playoffs.

  • Fraser-McGurk scored 95* off 46 balls.
  • The Renegades chased down a target of 196 with 12 balls to spare.
  • This win ended Brisbane Heat's title defense.
  • The match showcased Fraser-McGurk's hard-hitting abilities, crucial for IPL 2025.
"His incredible form and ability to handle pressure could be a massive boost for the Delhi Capitals in IPL 2025."

Fraser-McGurk’s performance indicates a promising future for the Delhi Capitals in the upcoming season.

item.title: Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final: KAR 247/4 vs VID in Vadodara - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karnataka vs Vidarbha LIVE Cricket Score, Vijay Hazare Trophy 2024/25 Final

Date & Source: January 2025, Indian Express

Vidarbha won the toss and opted to bowl first against Karnataka in the final match at Kotambi Stadium, Vadodara.

  • Karun Nair is the key player for Vidarbha, with impressive scores in previous matches, totaling 752 runs.
  • Nair's tally is the highest for a captain in Vijay Hazare Trophy history.
  • Vidarbha's and Karnataka's playing XI are listed, highlighting key players from both teams.
  • Nair could potentially break the record for most runs in a single season.
“Another heavy score could further brighten Nair’s chances of finding a place in India’s one-day side.”

The final match promises high stakes as both teams battle for the Vijay Hazare Trophy title, with Karnataka aiming to secure victory under the leadership of Mayank Agarwal.

item.title: Rohit Sharma breaks silence on his equation with Gautam Gambhir after dressing room leaks: ‘I'm not going to sit and…' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rohit Sharma breaks silence on his equation with Gautam Gambhir after dressing room leaks: ‘I'm not going to sit and…'

Date: January 18, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

India captain Rohit Sharma broke his silence regarding his relationship with Gautam Gambhir amidst media speculation of a fallout. Rohit reassured his captaincy position ahead of the England ODIs and Champions Trophy 2025.

  • Rohit faced criticism for his performance during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.
  • Controversies included dressing room leaks and speculation regarding his captaincy future.
  • Press conference confirmed Rohit's ongoing role as captain.
“It's very clear in my mind. But Gautam Gambhir is somebody... once we enter the field, he trusts what the captain is doing on the field.”

Rohit remains committed to leading the team while maintaining trust and communication with Gambhir.
